title: How have cooking habits changed in your country?

korean: 한국의 요리 습관이 많이 변한 것 같아.
예전엔 집에서 거의 다 해먹었는데, 요즘은 배달이나 외식이 많아.
특히 1인 가구가 늘면서 간편식 수요가 늘었어.
편의점이나 마트에 간편하게 데워 먹는 음식들이 정말 많아.
재료가 다 손질돼서 나오니까 요리하기 편해.
요리 초보자들도 쉽게 따라 할 수 있어.
홈쿡 문화가 다시 활성화되는 느낌도 있어.
건강을 생각해서 직접 만들어 먹는 사람들도 늘었고.
하지만 여전히 바쁜 사람들은 배달에 많이 의존해.
전체적으로 다양한 선택지가 생긴 것 같아.
english: I think cooking habits in Korea have changed a lot.
Before, people cooked almost everything at home, but these days there's a lot of delivery and eating out.
Especially as single-person households increased, demand for convenience foods grew.
There are really many foods at convenience stores or supermarkets that can be easily heated and eaten.
Meal kits have also become popular.
All ingredients come prepared, so it's convenient to cook.
Even cooking beginners can easily follow along.
Many recipes are also shared on YouTube or Instagram.
There's also a feeling that home cooking culture is being revitalized.
The number of people who cook themselves for health has also increased.
But busy people still rely a lot on delivery.
Overall, it seems various options have emerged.
